name: Front Mission: The Zanolian Conflict
description:
The Tango 2  squad is forced to test out a new Steel Frame during live combat while trying to save a Zanolian city from a hostile take over.  Take command of your units in this Tactical/Strategy game made in SRPG Studio.

This is a fan made project loosely based in the Front Mission universe.  Testing the waters of adding something modern other than the countless Fire Emblem clones out there.
